languages.text: "Скрепи душу, слуга Империума! Твои слова помогут мне одолеть тех, кто предал Кьяву Гамма!"

traits.locale_text: "Скрепи душу, слуга Империума! Твои слова помогут мне одолеть тех, кто предал Кьява Гамму!"

languages.text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"
languages.original_text: "Скрепи душу, слуга Империума! Твои слова помогут мне одолеть тех, кто предал Кьяву Гамма!"

traits.locale_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"
"Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

"Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"
"Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

languages.text: “坚守你的信念吧，帝国的仆人！你的话语将会帮助我消灭那些背叛了基亚瓦伽马星的叛徒！”
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: “坚守你的信念吧，帝国的仆人！你的话语将会帮助我消灭那些背叛了基亚瓦伽马星的叛徒！”

languages.text: «¡Prepare su corazón, siervo del Imperium! ¡Tus palabras me ayudarán a acabar con aquellos que han traicionado a Kiava Gamma!».
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Prepare su corazón, siervo del Imperium! ¡Tus palabras me ayudarán a acabar con aquellos que han traicionado a Kiava Gamma!».

languages.text: 「持ち堪えるんだ、帝国の使いよ！お前の言葉は、キアヴァ・ガンマを裏切った者達を倒す力になる！」
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: 「持ち堪えるんだ、帝国の使いよ！お前の言葉は、キアヴァ・ガンマを裏切った者達を倒す力になる！」

languages.text: "Stählt Euer Herz, Diener des Imperiums! Eure Worte werden mir helfen, jene zur Strecke zu bringen, die Kiava Gamma verraten haben!"
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: "Stählt Euer Herz, Diener des Imperiums! Eure Worte werden mir helfen, jene zur Strecke zu bringen, die Kiava Gamma verraten haben!"

languages.text: « Hardi, serviteur de l'Imperium ! Ce que vous m'avez appris me sera utile pour triompher des traîtres sur Kiava Gamma ! »
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: « Hardi, serviteur de l'Imperium ! Ce que vous m'avez appris me sera utile pour triompher des traîtres sur Kiava Gamma ! »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un hizmetkârı, kalbini ferah tutasın! Dediklerin, Kiava Gama'ya ihanet edenleri alaşağı etmeme yardımcı olacak!"
languages.original_text: "Steel your heart, servant of the Imperium! Your words will help me bring down those who have betrayed Kiava Gamma!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un hizmetkârı, kalbini ferah tut! Dediklerin Kiava Gama'ya ihanet edenleri alaşağı etmeme yardımcı olacak!"
